title: When you dowload replays
body: ...does it only download into the client? Or does it save somewhere to my pc? Is there a way to download a full replay other than booting up the replay in-client, clicking "record" and just letting it play?

replies.body:
Replays save to your documents folder, per the [replays ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)guide, and available for the duration of that patch.  You'll want to turn it into a highlight to use it after that point!  

C:\Users\\Documents\LeagueofLegends\Highlights

I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=G29vGaJ9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-03T22:47:57.092+0000)
>
> Replays save to your documents folder, per the [replays ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)guide, and available for the duration of that patch.  You'll want to turn it into a highlight to use it after that point!  
> 
> C:\Users\\Documents\LeagueofLegends\Highlights
> 
> I hope that helps!

Thanks!
